dict.acceptation: 几乎，差不多；将近；快要；近乎；

sent.orig: But it is almost lost almost. In football, almost is always a big question mark.
sent.trans: 但是我们几乎已经失败了。但是‘几乎’在足球世界里经常会是一个很大的问号。

sent.orig: Process equipment has been almost erected, and erection of pipe racks have almost been completed.
sent.trans: 工艺设备基本安装就位，管架安装基本完毕。

sent.orig: Almost all our daily needs are imported. Almost all our manufactured products are exported.
sent.trans: 我们的日常必需品几乎全属进口，我们制造的产品几乎全部出口外销。

sent.orig: Mark: It almost sounds ah, almost sounds too simple.
sent.trans: Mark:这听起来几乎，啊，听起来几乎太简单了。

sent.orig: Every year, it kills almost almost 680,000 people around the world.
sent.trans: 每年，它都会造成全世界几乎680.000的人的死亡。
